dcterms:description: A task that contrasts learners’ preferences for counting vs. memorization, training models to fit a single training example and testing on a range of inputs.
dcterms:title: Count-or-Memorization

dcterms:description: A task that examines learners’ generalization capabilities after training on a single example representing a mapping of an input string to an output string, testing on a range of inputs.
dcterms:title: Add-or-Multiply

dcterms:description: A task that contrasts hierarchical and linear inductive reasoning, training on nested structures and testing on inputs of varying depths.
dcterms:title: Hierarchical-or-Linear

dcterms:creator: J. Lake
M. Baroni
dcterms:description: A benchmark used for studying systematic generalization of seq2seq learners, involving input-output mappings with modifiers.
dcterms:title: SCAN
